Text.Name: Please enter the username and password to access this SageTV server:
Use Pause or Abc/123 to enter text via the number pad.

Action.Name: "REM If username entered, set focus to next input field"
"REM Get user name via NTE entry dialog."
"Check to see if they've been sitting at this login screen for too long"
"REM Get password via NTE entry dialog."
"Use Pause or Abc/123 to toggle number pad text entry mode."
"REM If can auto login, show that option."
"REM Make sure there is a username + pwd, then try to login"
"REM Check the Place Shifter user list to to see if a user with this password is authenticated to login or not"
"REM Compare entered password with all the existing users' passwords"
"You have entered an invalid username and password. You have " + LoginAttemptsLeft + " tries left before you will be disconnected.\n \n"
"REM If AutoLogin has been set, then cache the login before disabling encryption."
"REM Next, mark this user as using this autologin setting."
"REM Get current list of this user's auto-login UI context authorizations"
"REM If current UI context is not already in this user's list, add it & write new list property."
"REM If needed, set the active security profile."
"REM Store old NTE settings & set defaults"
"No Place Shifter users are available. A new user must be created on the server, or an existing user must be enabled, before login is possible.\n \n"
